What is the genus of the knot given in the link diagram below?

            o-o
        o        o
     o              o
    o                 o
     o              o
        o        o
            o-o
message_2:
The given knot diagram represents the trefoil knot, which is the simplest nontrivial knot. To determine the genus of a knot, we can use the formula:

genus = (crossing number - 1) / 2

The trefoil knot has a crossing number of 3 (there are three crossings in the diagram). Plugging this into the formula, we get:

genus = (3 - 1) / 2
genus = 2 / 2
genus = 1

So, the genus of the trefoil knot is 1.
